title.jp: Don't Look at Me Like I'm a Pig

synopsis: Yui, a maid robot, has just been purchased from Maidworks. She thinks she will be doing normal cleaning; but her new owner has other ideas for her. Among many things he wants her to dress up in costumes from his fantasies.
